jobs.title: Frontend Developer
jobs.desc: Design and develop responsive, accessible web interfaces using React and Tailwind CSS. Collaborate with UX/UI designers to ensure pixel-perfect implementation, optimize performance for various devices, and maintain clean, reusable code. Participate in code reviews, stay updated on the latest frontend technologies, and contribute ideas to improve the user experience.
resp: Develop and maintain scalable web applications using React and Tailwind CSS
Collaborate with UX/UI designers to deliver visually consistent interfaces
Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability
Perform code reviews and maintain code quality
Stay updated on industry trends and propose new solutions
req: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field
2+ years of experience with React and frontend frameworks
Strong knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript
Familiarity with version control (Git)
Understanding of responsive and accessible design
jobs.fullDesc: TechNova Solutions is looking for a Frontend Developer to join our New York team. In this role, you will design and develop responsive, accessible web interfaces using React and Tailwind CSS, collaborating closely with UX/UI designers to ensure pixel-perfect implementation. You’ll optimize performance for various devices, maintain clean, reusable code, and participate in code reviews. Staying updated on the latest frontend technologies is encouraged, and you’ll have opportunities to contribute ideas to improve the user experience. We value innovation, collaboration, and continuous growth, providing an inclusive workplace where your contributions are recognized and your career development is supported. You’ll work with cross-functional teams, help shape our digital strategy, and be encouraged to share ideas and propose improvements. If you are passionate about building intuitive applications that make a real impact, we’d love to hear from you. Join us and be part of a team dedicated to pushing the boundaries of modern web development.

jobs.title: Content Writer
jobs.desc: Write high-quality blog posts, product descriptions, and SEO-optimized articles to attract and engage audiences. Conduct thorough research on industry-related topics, adapt tone and style to different target groups, and ensure all content meets editorial standards. Collaborate with marketing teams to align messaging with broader branding and business goals.
resp: Produce blog posts, articles, and product descriptions
Conduct keyword research for SEO optimization
Ensure content aligns with brand voice and tone
Proofread and edit work to meet editorial standards
Collaborate with marketing team for campaign alignment
req: Proven writing experience with a portfolio of published work
Strong research and communication skills
Knowledge of SEO best practices
Ability to adapt writing style to different audiences
Time management and organizational skills
ben: Opportunity to work with diverse clients
jobs.fullDesc: ContentCraft Agency is seeking a talented freelance Content Writer to join our distributed team. This contract position is ideal for writers who excel in producing high-quality, SEO-friendly content across a variety of industries. You will be responsible for creating blog posts, product descriptions, and articles that inform and engage readers. The role requires strong research skills, adaptability in tone and style, and the ability to meet editorial standards. You’ll collaborate with marketing strategists to ensure content aligns with campaign objectives and brand voice. We value creativity, adaptability, and attention to detail, offering remote flexibility and opportunities for long-term projects. Writers who thrive here are self-starters who enjoy the balance of independence and collaboration. If you are passionate about storytelling, motivated by deadlines, and excited to make an impact through content, we’d love to hear from you.

jobs.title: Marketing Intern
jobs.desc: Assist the marketing team in planning and executing digital and offline campaigns. Help track analytics, prepare performance reports, and create engaging content for social media. Participate in brainstorming sessions, conduct competitor research, and support event organization to gain hands-on experience in multiple aspects of marketing and brand promotion.
resp: Support marketing campaigns with research and execution
Create and schedule social media content
Assist in preparing reports and tracking analytics
Help organize events and promotional activities
Participate in brainstorming sessions for new strategies
req: Current student or recent graduate in Marketing, Business, or related field
Strong written and verbal communication skills
Basic knowledge of social media platforms
Detail-oriented and eager to learn
Ability to work collaboratively with a team
ben: Exposure to multiple areas of marketing
Opportunity to work on real campaigns
Potential for full-time offer after internship
jobs.fullDesc: GrowthEdge Marketing is excited to offer an internship opportunity for motivated students and recent graduates who are eager to gain practical experience in the world of marketing. As a Marketing Intern, you will play a supportive role in helping our team execute both digital and offline campaigns. Your tasks will include creating and scheduling engaging content for social media, assisting in report preparation, and analyzing campaign performance. You’ll also contribute to event planning, conduct competitor research, and participate in creative brainstorming sessions. This internship is designed to provide you with well-rounded exposure to different aspects of marketing, from social media management to campaign strategy. Our ideal candidate is detail-oriented, enthusiastic, and eager to learn in a fast-paced environment. At GrowthEdge Marketing, we foster a collaborative workplace where interns are valued team members and encouraged to share fresh perspectives. You will receive guidance and mentorship from experienced marketing professionals, ensuring you build both technical skills and industry knowledge.

jobs.title: Backend Developer
jobs.desc: Develop and maintain server-side applications using Node.js and related frameworks. Integrate APIs, manage databases, and ensure system scalability and security. Collaborate with frontend developers to deliver seamless user experiences, troubleshoot technical issues, and write clean, maintainable code that adheres to industry standards and best development practices.
resp: Develop backend systems using Node.js and Express
Design and manage relational and NoSQL databases
Integrate third-party and internal APIs
Ensure application scalability, performance, and security
Collaborate with frontend teams for full-stack development
req: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field
3+ years of experience in backend development
Proficiency in Node.js and related frameworks
Experience with SQL and NoSQL databases
Knowledge of cloud platforms and containerization
ben: Flexible work schedule with remote days
jobs.fullDesc: CodeForge Systems is looking for an experienced Backend Developer to join our engineering team in Austin, TX. In this role, you will be responsible for building and maintaining the server-side logic that powers our applications, ensuring they are scalable, secure, and high-performing. You will work extensively with Node.js, Express, and various database technologies, integrating APIs and managing complex data flows. Collaboration with frontend developers will be key to delivering seamless end-to-end user experiences. Beyond coding, you will contribute to architecture discussions, propose improvements, and troubleshoot performance issues. The ideal candidate is detail-oriented, well-versed in industry best practices, and passionate about building robust backend systems. At CodeForge Systems, we encourage creativity and innovation while maintaining a strong focus on code quality and long-term scalability. Our company culture values collaboration, continuous learning, and technical excellence.

jobs.title: Customer Support Specialist
jobs.desc: Provide timely and professional support to customers via email, chat, and phone. Troubleshoot product issues, document solutions, and escalate complex cases to the technical team. Maintain a positive and empathetic tone, ensure customer satisfaction, and help improve support processes by giving feedback based on customer interactions.
resp: Respond to customer inquiries via email, chat, and phone
Troubleshoot and resolve product-related issues
Document solutions in knowledge base
Escalate technical issues to specialized teams
Contribute feedback to improve support processes
req: High school diploma or equivalent; Bachelor’s preferred
1+ years of customer support experience
Excellent communication and problem-solving skills
Ability to remain calm under pressure
Familiarity with CRM software
jobs.fullDesc: HelpHive Solutions is seeking a dedicated Customer Support Specialist to join our fully remote team. In this role, you will serve as the first point of contact for customers, delivering friendly, timely, and effective support. You will communicate with users via email, live chat, and phone calls, helping resolve product issues while ensuring that every customer feels valued and supported. You will also be responsible for documenting solutions in our internal knowledge base, escalating more complex issues to technical teams when needed, and offering feedback that contributes to the continuous improvement of our support systems. The ideal candidate is empathetic, patient, and resourceful, with strong communication skills and the ability to troubleshoot efficiently. Experience with CRM software and prior customer support roles is highly desirable.

jobs.title: Data Analyst
jobs.desc: Collect, process, and analyze large datasets to identify patterns, trends, and insights that drive business decisions. Create visual dashboards and reports for stakeholders, collaborate with different departments to interpret findings, and ensure data accuracy. Stay updated with analytical tools and help optimize operations through data-driven recommendations.
resp: Collect, clean, and validate large datasets
Develop dashboards and visual reports for stakeholders
Analyze data to identify trends and business insights
Work with cross-functional teams to interpret results
Ensure compliance with data governance policies
req: Bachelor’s degree in Data Science, Statistics, or related field
Proficiency in SQL, Python, or R
Experience with data visualization tools like Tableau or Power BI
Strong analytical and critical thinking skills
Attention to detail and commitment to accuracy
jobs.fullDesc: InsightWorks Analytics is hiring a Data Analyst to join our San Francisco team. In this role, you will gather, process, and analyze large and complex datasets to uncover valuable insights that guide critical business decisions. You will design dashboards, build reports, and communicate findings to stakeholders across different departments, helping them make informed, data-driven choices. Responsibilities include collecting and cleaning data, ensuring accuracy and integrity, and collaborating with colleagues to translate analytical results into actionable recommendations. Our ideal candidate is detail-oriented, curious, and adept at using tools such as SQL, Python, R, and visualization platforms like Tableau or Power BI. Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to communicate technical results in simple terms are essential.

jobs.title: Social Media Manager
jobs.desc: Manage and grow the company’s social media presence across multiple platforms. Create engaging content, schedule posts, and interact with followers to build a loyal community. Track analytics to measure performance, adjust strategies based on data, and collaborate with designers and copywriters to ensure brand consistency.
resp: Manage company social media accounts across platforms
Plan and schedule engaging content
Engage with followers and respond to comments/messages
Track performance metrics and adjust strategies
Collaborate with designers and content creators
req: Experience managing social media for brands or businesses
Knowledge of analytics tools and reporting
Strong communication and copywriting skills
Creativity and ability to adapt quickly to trends
Organizational skills and attention to detail
jobs.fullDesc: PulseConnect Media is seeking a part-time Social Media Manager to enhance and expand our digital presence. Based in Miami, this role involves managing accounts across major platforms, creating engaging and visually appealing content, and fostering strong connections with our online community. You will track analytics to measure the performance of campaigns, identify growth opportunities, and adjust strategies to optimize engagement and reach. Collaboration is a key part of the role, as you will work closely with designers, copywriters, and marketing specialists to ensure brand consistency and cohesive storytelling across channels. The ideal candidate is creative, proactive, and knowledgeable about current trends in digital media.

jobs.title: UX/UI Designer
jobs.desc: Design intuitive and visually appealing interfaces for web and mobile applications. Conduct user research, create wireframes, and develop prototypes to test usability. Collaborate with developers to ensure accurate implementation, and refine designs based on user feedback to improve overall product experience and accessibility standards.
resp: Conduct user research and usability testing
Create wireframes, prototypes, and design systems
Design intuitive and visually appealing interfaces
Collaborate with developers for accurate implementation
Refine designs based on user feedback
req: Bachelor’s degree in Design, HCI, or related field
Portfolio showcasing UX/UI projects
Proficiency with design tools (Figma, Sketch, Adobe XD)
Understanding of accessibility standards
Strong problem-solving and collaboration skills
ben: Opportunities to work on innovative projects
Access to design tools and resources
jobs.fullDesc: Visionary Apps Studio is searching for a contract UX/UI Designer to help shape the user experience of our web and mobile applications. As a designer, you will play a key role in understanding user needs, translating research into wireframes and prototypes, and designing interfaces that are both functional and aesthetically pleasing. You will work closely with developers to ensure designs are implemented accurately and consistently, and you will refine your work based on usability testing and user feedback. This role requires a blend of creativity, empathy, and technical expertise. Proficiency with tools such as Figma, Sketch, and Adobe XD is essential, as is a strong understanding of accessibility standards and design best practices.

jobs.title: IT Support Intern
jobs.desc: Assist the IT team in troubleshooting technical issues, setting up hardware, and managing software updates. Provide support for employees, document solutions, and learn best practices for maintaining network and system security. Gain hands-on experience by working on real support tickets and technology improvement projects.
resp: Assist with troubleshooting hardware and software issues
Support employees with IT-related requests
Document solutions and update knowledge base
Help with system updates and security checks
Participate in IT projects and process improvements
req: Current student or recent graduate in IT, Computer Science, or related field
Basic understanding of hardware and software systems
Strong problem-solving skills
Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities
Eagerness to learn and adapt quickly
ben: Exposure to network and system security practices
jobs.fullDesc: NextGen Tech Solutions is offering an exciting IT Support Internship in Boston, designed for students or recent graduates who want to gain real-world experience in technology support. In this role, you will assist the IT team with day-to-day tasks such as troubleshooting hardware and software issues, setting up new devices, and providing technical assistance to employees across the organization. You will also help maintain system security, document solutions for future reference, and participate in projects aimed at improving IT processes. This internship is an excellent opportunity to apply classroom knowledge to real business environments while building valuable problem-solving and communication skills.

jobs.title: Project Manager
jobs.desc: Plan, oversee, and deliver projects on time and within budget. Coordinate between teams, track progress, and manage risks effectively. Maintain communication with stakeholders, prepare detailed reports, and ensure all deliverables meet quality standards. Foster a collaborative environment to keep teams motivated and aligned.
resp: Lead planning and execution of projects from start to finish
Track project timelines, budgets, and deliverables
Facilitate communication across departments
Identify and manage risks to minimize delays
Prepare progress reports for stakeholders
req: Bachelor’s degree in Business, Management, or related field
3+ years of project management experience
Proficiency with project management tools (Asana, Jira, MS Project)
Strong organizational and leadership skills
Excellent communication and problem-solving abilities
jobs.fullDesc: SummitPoint Consulting is hiring a skilled Project Manager to join our Denver office. In this role, you will oversee the planning, execution, and completion of projects, ensuring they are delivered on time, within scope, and on budget. You will coordinate efforts across multiple departments, keep stakeholders updated through detailed reports, and identify potential risks before they escalate. We are looking for someone who thrives on organization, excels in leadership, and has a proven ability to guide teams through complex challenges. The ideal candidate will be proficient with project management tools, detail-oriented, and confident in making data-driven decisions.

jobs.title: Video Editor
jobs.desc: Edit and produce high-quality video content for marketing, social media, and corporate purposes. Work with raw footage, add effects, and sync audio to create a polished final product. Collaborate with creative teams to align visuals with brand storytelling and meet project deadlines consistently.
resp: Edit raw video footage into engaging content
Add effects, transitions, and audio synchronization
Collaborate with creative teams to align storytelling
Optimize videos for different platforms
Meet deadlines and maintain consistent quality
req: Proficiency with video editing software (Adobe Premiere, Final Cut, DaVinci Resolve)
Strong storytelling and visual skills
Experience editing for marketing or social media
Ability to work independently and meet deadlines
Attention to detail and creativity
ben: Networking opportunities in the media industry
jobs.fullDesc: VisionCraft Studios is looking for a talented Part-Time Video Editor to join our creative team in Las Vegas. You will be responsible for editing raw footage into polished, high-quality video content for marketing campaigns, social media, and corporate projects. This role requires proficiency in editing software, strong storytelling abilities, and the ability to align video content with brand identity. You will collaborate closely with designers, marketers, and copywriters to create impactful visuals that resonate with audiences. The ideal candidate is detail-oriented, creative, and able to manage multiple projects simultaneously.

jobs.title: Virtual Assistant
jobs.desc: Provide administrative support to executives, including scheduling meetings, managing emails, and conducting research. Keep documents organized, handle confidential information, and ensure smooth day-to-day operations. Communicate effectively across teams and adapt to shifting priorities while working independently in a fast-paced environment.
resp: Manage schedules, appointments, and meetings
Handle email correspondence and document organization
Conduct research and prepare summaries
Provide administrative support to executives
Maintain confidentiality and professionalism
req: Previous administrative or virtual assistant experience
Excellent organizational and time management skills
Strong written and verbal communication
Ability to work independently and multitask
Proficiency with productivity tools (Google Workspace, MS Office)
jobs.fullDesc: ProAssist Services is seeking a reliable and detail-oriented Virtual Assistant to provide administrative support for our executive team. This fully remote position involves managing schedules, handling emails, organizing documents, and conducting research as needed. The role requires someone who can adapt quickly to shifting priorities, communicate effectively across teams, and maintain confidentiality at all times. You will be expected to work independently, managing tasks with efficiency and professionalism. Our ideal candidate has prior experience in administrative support, is highly organized, and is comfortable using productivity tools such as Google Workspace and Microsoft Office.

jobs.title: Sales Executive
jobs.desc: Drive revenue growth by identifying leads, building client relationships, and closing deals. Conduct market research, present solutions to potential customers, and negotiate terms. Maintain sales records, meet targets, and collaborate with the marketing team to develop outreach strategies that expand market presence.
resp: Identify and pursue new business opportunities
Build and maintain strong client relationships
Conduct presentations and negotiate contracts
Collaborate with marketing on outreach strategies
Track sales performance and meet revenue targets
req: Bachelor’s degree in Business, Marketing, or related field
2+ years of sales experience
Excellent communication and negotiation skills
Ability to meet and exceed targets
Strong interpersonal and relationship-building skills
jobs.fullDesc: GrowthEdge Enterprises is looking for an ambitious Sales Executive to join our Dallas team. In this role, you will be responsible for driving revenue growth by identifying new business opportunities, building lasting client relationships, and closing deals. You will conduct market research to understand client needs, present tailored solutions, and negotiate terms to maximize value for both parties. The ideal candidate is motivated, results-driven, and thrives in a fast-paced environment. Strong communication and negotiation skills are essential, as is the ability to collaborate with marketing teams to refine outreach strategies.

jobs.title: Tutor
jobs.desc: Provide academic support to high school and college students in various subjects. Develop personalized lesson plans, explain complex concepts clearly, and monitor student progress. Encourage effective study habits, offer constructive feedback, and adapt teaching styles to suit individual learning needs and goals.
resp: Provide one-on-one or group tutoring sessions
Develop personalized lesson plans
Explain complex topics clearly and effectively
Track and report student progress
Adapt teaching styles to meet student needs
req: Experience tutoring or teaching
Strong knowledge in relevant academic subjects
Excellent communication and patience
Ability to motivate and encourage students
Flexibility to work evenings or weekends
ben: Opportunity to make a direct impact on students
Access to teaching resources and materials
jobs.fullDesc: BrightPath Learning is seeking a passionate Tutor to join our Phoenix team. This part-time role involves providing academic support to students in subjects ranging from math and science to English and test preparation. You will work closely with students to develop personalized lesson plans, explain difficult concepts in clear and relatable ways, and track progress to ensure continuous improvement. The role requires patience, strong communication skills, and a genuine desire to help students succeed.

jobs.title: Mobile App Developer
jobs.desc: Design and develop mobile applications for Android and iOS platforms using modern frameworks. Collaborate with designers to ensure an intuitive user experience, test applications for bugs, and optimize performance. Stay updated on mobile technology trends and contribute to continuous product improvement.
resp: Design, build, and maintain mobile apps for iOS and Android
Collaborate with UI/UX designers for seamless user experience
Conduct testing and debugging for performance optimization
Integrate APIs and third-party libraries
Stay updated with latest mobile development trends
req: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field
2+ years of experience in mobile app development
Proficiency with Swift, Kotlin, or React Native
Strong debugging and problem-solving skills
Familiarity with REST APIs and mobile UI frameworks
jobs.fullDesc: AppVantage Labs is seeking a talented Mobile App Developer to join our San Diego team. In this role, you will design, build, and maintain cutting-edge applications for iOS and Android platforms. You will work closely with UI/UX designers to ensure apps deliver intuitive and engaging user experiences. A key part of the role involves testing, debugging, and optimizing app performance while integrating APIs and third-party libraries. The ideal candidate has experience with Swift, Kotlin, or cross-platform frameworks like React Native, and is always eager to stay current with mobile technology trends.

jobs.title: SEO Specialist
jobs.desc: Improve website visibility and ranking through keyword research, content optimization, and link-building strategies. Monitor analytics, adjust tactics based on performance, and stay informed about search engine algorithm updates. Collaborate with content teams to ensure best SEO practices are followed across all digital platforms.
resp: Conduct keyword research and on-page optimization
Implement link-building strategies
Monitor analytics and adjust tactics
Collaborate with content creators to align SEO goals
Stay updated with algorithm changes
req: Proven experience as an SEO specialist
Knowledge of Google Analytics and Search Console
Understanding of on-page and off-page SEO
Strong research and analytical skills
Ability to work independently
ben: Work with diverse clients and industries
jobs.fullDesc: RankRise Digital is seeking an experienced SEO Specialist to support our clients’ online visibility efforts. As part of this contract role, you will conduct keyword research, optimize website content, and implement link-building strategies to improve search rankings. You will monitor performance metrics through tools like Google Analytics and Search Console, making adjustments to ensure optimal results. This role requires someone who stays ahead of algorithm updates and can quickly adapt strategies to maintain competitiveness.

jobs.title: Email Marketing Manager
jobs.desc: Plan, execute, and analyze email marketing campaigns to engage customers and drive conversions. Create compelling copy and visuals, segment audiences for targeted messaging, and track open and click-through rates. Use insights to refine strategies and increase campaign effectiveness over time.
resp: Plan and manage email marketing campaigns
Segment audiences for targeted outreach
Create engaging email copy and visuals
Monitor KPIs and report campaign performance
Refine strategies based on data insights
req: Experience in email marketing or digital marketing
Proficiency with email platforms (Mailchimp, HubSpot, etc.)
Strong copywriting and content creation skills
Ability to analyze metrics and optimize campaigns
Creative thinking and attention to detail
jobs.fullDesc: InboxEdge Solutions is hiring a Remote Email Marketing Manager to design and execute impactful email campaigns that engage audiences and drive conversions. This role involves creating compelling copy, eye-catching visuals, and targeted messaging strategies that reach the right people at the right time. You will analyze campaign performance metrics, such as open and click-through rates, and adjust strategies to improve effectiveness. The ideal candidate has experience with email platforms like Mailchimp or HubSpot, strong writing skills, and the ability to think both creatively and analytically.

jobs.title: Human Resources Intern
jobs.desc: Support HR operations, including recruitment, onboarding, and employee engagement activities. Assist in preparing documentation, maintain personnel records, and help organize training sessions. Gain exposure to HR policies and compliance req while working closely with experienced HR professionals to learn best practices.
resp: Assist with recruitment and onboarding processes
Maintain and update personnel records
Help organize training and development sessions
Support employee engagement initiatives
Learn HR policies and compliance practices
req: Currently pursuing a degree in HR, Business, or related field
Strong organizational and communication skills
Ability to maintain confidentiality
Detail-oriented with good multitasking abilities
Eagerness to learn and grow in HR
jobs.fullDesc: PeopleFirst HR is seeking a motivated Human Resources Intern to join our Houston office. This internship offers hands-on exposure to key HR functions including recruitment, onboarding, employee engagement, and compliance. You will assist with maintaining personnel records, preparing documentation, and supporting training initiatives. The role is designed to give you a comprehensive understanding of HR operations while providing mentorship from experienced professionals.

jobs.title: Cybersecurity Analyst
jobs.desc: Monitor networks and systems for security breaches, investigate incidents, and implement protective measures. Stay ahead of potential threats by researching new attack methods, performing vulnerability assessments, and developing security protocols. Collaborate with IT teams to ensure systems remain safe and compliant.
resp: Monitor networks for suspicious activity
Investigate and respond to security incidents
Perform vulnerability assessments and audits
Develop and implement security protocols
Collaborate with IT teams for compliance
req: Bachelor’s degree in Cybersecurity, IT, or related field
2+ years of experience in cybersecurity or IT security
Knowledge of firewalls, IDS/IPS, and SIEM tools
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Relevant certifications (CISSP, CEH, CompTIA Security+) preferred
ben: Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance
Career growth in a fast-growing industry
jobs.fullDesc: SecureNet Technologies is looking for a proactive Cybersecurity Analyst to join our Washington, DC team. In this role, you will monitor networks and systems for suspicious activity, investigate security incidents, and implement measures to protect critical infrastructure. You will conduct vulnerability assessments, research new attack methods, and help develop security protocols to ensure compliance and resilience. The ideal candidate has a solid foundation in cybersecurity, experience with monitoring tools, and a strong understanding of threat landscapes.
